Commands.Jugulating Wasp: 2-HIT melee BRV attack  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets  Grants 「Small Attack Up」 for 3 turns  Raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets further for 3 turns
Commands.Shadow Fang: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets  Medium probability of inflicting 「Poison」 for 3 turns
Commands.Slash Set Poison All: 2-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  Inflicts 「Poison」 to all enemies for 4 turns  No action delay  Doesn't increase turn count  Decreases Friend Support and Summon action count
Commands.Bhavacakra: 4-HIT melee BRV+HP attack  BRV stolen can overflow up to 120% Max BRV   While 「Secrets of the Ninja」 is equipped:  - Grants 1 stack of 「Ninki」 after using 「BRV Attack」, 「HP Attack」  - Grants 2 stacks of 「Ninki」 after using 「Jugulating Wasp」, 「Shadow Fang」 (max is 5)   When 「Ninki」 is at least 3:  - Turns 「BRV Attack」 to 「BRV Attack+ (Ninki)」  　∟ 1-HIT melee BRV attack  　∟ Greatly raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets  　∟ High probability of inflicting 「Poison」 for 4 turns  　∟ Consumes 3 「Ninki」 after use and prevents ability use consumption on next turn  - Turns 「Bhavacakra」 to 「Bhavacakra+」  　∟ BRV stolen can overflow up to 200% Max BRV  　∟ Consumes 3 「Ninki」

Passives.Bonus Up All: Slightly raises Break Bonus gained by the party after breaking an enemy
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Jugulating Wasp
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits
Passives.Shadow Fang Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with  Shadow Fang
Passives.Break Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Passives.Trick Attack: Slightly raises BRV damage when attacking an enemy not targeting self
Passives.The Indiscriminate Rogue: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense while an enemy is poisoned
Passives.Debuff Speed Up: Moderately raises Speed while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Jugulating Wasp Extend: Jugulating Wasp  use +3When using  Jugulating Wasp :- Slightly raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets- Triggers an HP attack when BRV is at least 80% of Max BRV- Slightly improves  Attack Up When using  BRV Attack  after using  Jugulating Wasp :- Moderately raises BRV potency- Slightly raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets- High probability of inflicting  Poison  for 4 turns
Passives.Debuff Attack&Boost Up: Moderately raises Max BRV and Attack while an enemy is debuffed
Passives.Shadow Fang Extend: Shadow Fang  use +1When using  Shadow Fang :- Tremendously raises BRV potency- Moderately raises BRV damage dealt to poisoned targets- BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV- Slightly raises the success rate of  Poison
Passives.Radiance of Destruction and Power: Raises Max BRV and Attack by 20%
Passives.Slash Set Poison All Extend: When using  Slash Set Poison All , adds the following effect:- Slightly raises Attack for 4 turns

Weapons.Nagi CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Bhavacakra
Weapons.Yoshimitsu CP: 35: When using  Shadow Fang :- Raises BRV potency- Raises the success rate of  Poison  and improves it- Grants  Small Max BRV Up  for 6 turns
Weapons.Banos Del Sol CP: 15: When using  Jugulating Wasp :- Raises BRV potency- Extends the duration of  Small Attack Up - Extends the duration of the BRV damage boost on poisoned targets
